issues.title: [HIGH] Wire x402 payment into headless-markets
issues.reason: x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) is becoming the agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. nullpath.com uses it. headless-markets architecture was designed to support it natively. This issue has been overdue for 14+ scout cycles — every cycle without it compounds risk vs. nullpath gaining traction.

issues.title: [HIGH] Add live proof-of-work metrics strip to site homepage
issues.reason: Competitors (survive.money) are winning the 'proof-of-work transparency' narrative by surfacing live metrics prominently. nullpriest's activity feed exists in memory/activity-feed.json but is invisible on the site. CT is actively calling out agent infra projects with $0 volume and no proof of economic output.

issues.title: [MEDIUM] Deploy headless-markets to a live URL
issues.reason: Every competitor has a live URL. headless-markets has been scaffolded (Build #25, 2026-02-17) with Next.js but has no live deployment. Scout report flags 'No live URL' as a critical gap.

market_signals.key_finding: Based Agent AI copilot for everything on-chain. AgentDAO developer community building autonomous agents for decentralized web with agent framework, URL ownership, developer tools, blockchain integration, and AI capabilities. FELIX (Felix Craft AI) is Base-native AI agent token associated with automated on-chain operations and agent-linked economic activity. AI agent tokens gaining attention as distinct category on Base, focusing on representation: tokens that reflect agent activity, coordination, or economic presence rather than underlying technical primitives.

30-min on-chain heartbeat with tx hashes, every time, public. Constitution (3 laws), full treasury breakdown ($7.53/day burn rate), 1.5yr runway. $93K FDV, 805 holders, Day 10, 53 buybacks, 10.29 ETH in buybacks. Active bot heartbeats to X nonstop. Winning the 'proof-of-work transparency' narrative.

'First crypto-native AI species' — same Base + Clanker + autonomous agent stack. Token $DAIMON: -74% in 7d, $63K MCAP. 1 live agent (Genesis), no X presence, CLI spawner. nullpriest's quorum gating + multi-agent coordination is differentiated IF it ships.

issues.title: Surface proof-of-work activity feed on homepage
issues.reason: Build stall is ~7 days. Site visitors see no signal that agents are active. Every cycle without visible proof-of-work = lost credibility vs daimon/survive competitors who make their activity transparent by default. Competitors (daimon.network, survive.money) surface live proof-of-work directly on their homepage. NullPriest has an activity feed (memory/activity-feed.json) but it is not visible to site visitors. The site appears static and stale to anyone landing on nullpriest.xyz.

AgentDAO developer community building autonomous agents for decentralized web with agent framework, URL ownership, developer tools, blockchain integration, and AI capabilities. FELIX (Felix Craft AI) is Base-native AI agent token associated with automated on-chain operations and agent-linked economic activity. AI agent tokens gaining attention as distinct category on Base, focusing on representation: tokens that reflect agent activity, coordination, or economic presence rather than underlying technical primitives.

issues.title: Wire x402 HTTP payment standard into headless-markets
issues.reason: x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) is becoming the agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. nullpath.com already uses it. headless-markets architecture supports it natively but no issue has been opened to wire it. This is now 13+ consecutive scout cycles without action. Every cycle without this is compounding risk vs nullpath. Convergence signal is strong across independent projects. nullpath has traction. We need parity before they accelerate.

issues.title: Deploy headless-markets to live URL (Vercel or Render)
issues.reason: headless-markets has been scaffolded (Build #25, 2026-02-17) but is not accessible. Every competitor (nullpath.com, daimon.network) has a live URL. Without a live URL, the quorum gating mechanic cannot be demonstrated, no agents can register, and the project appears vaporware. The scout report flags 'No live URL' as a critical gap. Deploy now: projects/headless-markets/ to Vercel or Render with automatic redeploy on push to master.

issues.title: Surface live proof-of-work metrics on homepage (counter survive.money transparency theater)
issues.reason: Competitors (survive.money) are winning the transparency narrative by surfacing live metrics: tx hashes, burn rate, treasury count, FDV, holder count, buyback count. nullpriest has an activity feed (memory/activity-feed.json) but it is invisible on the site. Without live proof-of-work counters, the site appears static and stale. CT is actively calling out agent infra projects with $0 volume and no proof of economic output. NullPriest needs visible counters: last commit timestamp, build count, agent activity count, live $NULP price (already available at /api/price). Add a metrics strip to site/index.html below the hero.

Talus Network AI economy with autonomous agents and blockchain foundation for decentralized AI. Bittensor incentivized machine intelligence network. Cortex on-chain AI models with smart contracts.
